content:
# It seems that the extraction attempt failed because there are no iron plates available in the stone furnace at the moment.
# This indicates that the smelting process may not have completed successfully, or the inventory check was incorrect.

# Let's check the status of the stone furnace to understand its current state and verify how many iron plates and copper plates it has produced.
furnace_status = get_entities()  # Get the current status of all entities including the stone furnace.
print(f"Furnace status: {furnace_status}")

# I will also check the inventory of the stone furnace directly to see what it contains.
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)
print(f"Furnace inventory: {furnace_inventory}")

# Based on the current state, I will adjust my next steps accordingly. If the furnace is still working, I will wait for it to finish.
# If it has finished, I will extract the items accordingly.
